Paragraph: The calculated saturation hole mobilities ( μ h ) for PTATDPP and PTAFDPP are 2.7 × 10^-2 and 8.9 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , respectively , with high on / off ratios ( > 10^5 ) and low threshold voltages ( < 20 V ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PTATDPP" and "PTAFDPP". These are the names of the materials for which certain properties, such as saturation hole mobilities, on/off ratios, and threshold voltages, have been calculated.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
